ABOUT
I have been a sports fan for as long as I can remember. I love watching and playing pretty much every sport. For the last 10 years or so I have been traveling to different stadiums. I travel to the stadiums not just to see the game, but also because I love exploring the new stadiums and all the different features they have to offer. To me, stadiums are a mini-vacation.

I love traveling to all types of sports stadiums, but personally I enjoy baseball stadiums the most. I enojy MLB, Minor League, Spring Training, College, and even high school stadiums. I have been to many of them already and plan to visit as many as I can in my lifetime. My bucketlist has always contained all the major league stadiums and I hope to one day see them all in person!



Field Hopper is all about Stadiums. With Field Hopper you can get information about Stadiums with their location and features. You can also keep track of which stadiums you have been to and which you want to visit. Compete with your friends and see who can get the most!
